task.en: I'm making a paper presentation about this article: https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/poster/94798. I've chosen a Keynote template. Now, I need your help copying the title into the slide's title and copying the authors into the subtitle of the slide.
task.zh: 要做一个paper presentation，关于这篇文章：https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/poster/94798。我选了一个Keynote模板。现在，我需要你帮我把标题复制到幻灯片的标题里面，把作者复制到幻灯片副标题中。
task.ar: أنا أقوم بعرض ورقة بحثية لهذه المقالة: https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/poster/94798. لقد اخترت قالب Keynote. الآن، أحتاج مساعدتك في نسخ العنوان إلى عنوان الشريحة ونسخ المؤلفين إلى العنوان الفرعي للشريحة.
task.ja: 私は次の記事についてプレゼンテーションを作っています: https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/poster/94798。Keynoteテンプレートを選びました。今、タイトルをスライドのタイトルにコピーし、著者をスライドの副題にコピーする手助けが必要です。
task.ru: Я делаю презентацию статьи о следующей работе: https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/poster/94798. Я выбрал шаблон Keynote. Теперь мне нужна ваша помощь: скопировать заголовок в заголовок слайда и авторов в подзаголовок слайда.

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Dynamic Waves Light"}'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "动态波浪（浅色）"}'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "أمواج ديناميكية فاتحة"}'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "ダイナミックウェーブ（ライト）"}'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Волны, динамическая светлая"}'

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document' | grep -q "Can Simple Averaging Defeat Modern Watermarks?" && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document' | grep "Pei Yang" | grep "Hai Ci" | grep "Yiren Song" | grep -q "Mike Zheng Shou" && echo "True" || echo "False"
